title: Dry Bones

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Bodyblock**: Protect your Target, Redirecting all visits on them to you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you die, you will automatically be revived on the start of second night after you die, cannot activate if there are no other Koopas alive.

desc:
Post 1447
*A skeleton Koopa that sometimes builds friends. Even after it collapses, it will sometimes get back up.*
